item.title: Tips to conveniently use models utils.Choices
item.description: # model_utils.Choices Django, DRF users Are you using model_utils.Choices? We use it conveniently, but basically we often use it for status management. Is it like this? class News(models.Model): STATUS = Choices( ('DRAFT','draft'), ('CHECK','waiting for review'), ('PUBLISHED','Public'), ) status = StatusField( choices_name='STATUS', help_text="Status", default=STATUS.DRAFT, ) title = models.CharField( max_length=1024, null=False, blank=False, default="", help_text="News title" ) body = models.TextField( null=False, blank=False, default="", help_text="News Details" ) What is the explanation (VALUE) of Choice used for?
